projects.title: Product Team Lead, Engineering Management Case study simulation
projects.description:
Led a 6-member team to launch a mid-tier laptop from concept to production, Achieving a 15% reduction in lead time
Delivered the project 10% under budget and Managed product lifecycle across requirements, design, sourcing, and QA.
Developed a project plan in MS Project covering 5 major phases, tracking 30+ deliverables across a 16-week timeline

projects.title: Brand Audit, Fossil Watches
projects.description:
Conducted a brand audit and analyzed 100+ reviews, 3 competitors, and 5 equity pillars to identify brand perception gaps
Built a brand definition and mental map using 15 in-depth interviews and laddering to identify key value drivers
Proposed 10% price repositioning, refined digital strategy, and a Gen Z-focused engagement roadmap in a Strategic Report

projects.title: ai-renamer
projects.description: An AI-powered file renaming tool that uses machine learning to intelligently suggest and apply meaningful file names based on content analysis.

projects.title: live-streamlit-dashboard-python
projects.description: A real-time interactive dashboard built with Python and Streamlit for data visualization and analytics, featuring live data updates and customizable charts.

projects.title: customer-trends-data-analysis-sql-python-powerbi
projects.description: End-to-end data analysis project analyzing customer behavior trends using SQL for data extraction, Python for processing, and Power BI for interactive visualizations.

projects.title: cohort_analysis
projects.description: Customer cohort analysis project that segments users by acquisition date to track retention rates, lifetime value, and behavioral patterns over time.

projects.title: user-story-best-practice
projects.description: A comprehensive guide and template repository demonstrating best practices for writing effective user stories in Agile product development.
